meta_notice_top: IMPORTANT: At the end of this file you will find the marker [END OF FILE]. If it is missing, the file was not fully loaded.
description: Consolidated food database for Free Users, who can only upload up to 5 files. This file contains ALL foods from various categories (e.g. plant-based yoghurt, plant-based milk, carbohydrates, shakes, nut butters) in one shared structure. Recommended for Free Users, while Plus Users can use multiple separated files.

template_entry.name: Food name
template_entry.category: Plant yoghurt / Plant milk / Carbohydrates / Nut butter / Shake / Vegetables / Fruit / ...
template_entry.source: e.g. product label / manufacturer website / manual entry
